title: One
lyrics: Tell me that you turned down the man Who asks for your hand Caus' you're waiting for me And I know, you're gonna be away a while, But I've got no plans at all to leave And would you take away my hopes and dreams And just stay with me oooh All my senses come to life While I am stumbling home as drunk as I Have ever been, and I'll never leave again Cause you are the only one And all my friends have gone to find Another place to let their hearts collide Just promise me you'll always be a friend Cause you are the only one Take my hand and my heart and soul I will Only have these eyes for you You know everything changes But we'll be strangers If we see this through. And you could stay within these walls and bleed But just stay with me I'm stumbling off drunk Getting myself lost I am so gone, So tell me the way home I listen to sad songs, singing about love
